original_text: And the Pharisees were saying to him, “Look, why are they doing what is not lawful on the Sabbath?”
korean_text: 바리새인들이 예수께 말하되 보시오 저들이 어찌하여 안식일에 하지 못할 일을 하나이까

sentences.original_text: And the Pharisees were saying to him,
why are they doing what is not lawful on the Sabbath?”
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌하여 그들이 안식일에 율법에 어긋나는 것을 하고 있느냐?”
